QueryViewSpec.Name: Add a Child Campaign Sponsorships Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Find sponsorships with a source of the Add a Child Campaign
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: with AddAChildSponsorships as ( select s.CONSTITUENTID, s.ID as SPONSORSHIPID, so_child.ID as CHILDID, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCOUNTRYID (so_child.ID) as COUNTRYID, s.STARTDATE as SPONSORSHIPSTARTDATE, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME, APPEAL.NAME as APPEALNAME from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on s.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID join dbo.REVENUE r on rs.REVENUEID = r.ID join dbo.APPEAL on r.APPEALID = APPEAL.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_child.ID where s.STATUSCODE = 1 and r.APPEALID = '4761ea46-f39f-4aa2-a52f-65451f467342' -- 10575 - Add a Child / Finish Strong Campaign ) select c.ID, c.LOOKUPID, c.NAME as CONSTITUENTNAME, c_appeal.APPEALID, c_appeal.MKTPACKAGE_DESCRIPTION, RESPONSE.RESPONSE, addachild.SPONSORSHIPID, addachild.CHILDID, addachild.SPONSORSHIPSTARTDATE, addachild.CHILDLOOKUPID, addachild.CHILDNAME, country.NAME as COUNTRYNAME, addachild.APPEALNAME as SPONSORSHIPAPPEALNAME, dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETACTIVECHILDSPONSORSHIPSFORSPONSOR(c.ID) as NUMBEROFCHLDSPONSORSHIPS from dbo.CONSTITUENT c left join AddAChildSponsorships addachild on c.ID = addachild.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.CONSTITUENT country on addachild.COUNTRYID = country.ID join dbo.V_QUERY_CONSTITUENTAPPEAL c_appeal on c_appeal.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID left join dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEALRESPONSE c_appealresponse on c_appealresponse.CONSTITUENTAPPEALID = c_appeal.ID left join dbo.RESPONSE ON dbo.RESPONSE.ID = c_appealresponse.RESPONSEID where c_appeal.APPEALID = '4761ea46-f39f-4aa2-a52f-65451f467342' -- 10575 - Add a Child / Finish Strong Campaign

OutputField.Name: MKTPACKAGE_DESCRIPTION
OutputField.Caption: Add a Child Direct Mail Package
